text: The RATP () is responsible for operating part of the public transport network in the Greater Paris area. In 2010, it transported around 3 billion passengers. == History == The RATP group was created on January 1st 1949. == Transport == RATP mainly operates Metros and Buses in Paris. They also operate the trams in Paris. == Other websites == *https://www.ratp.fr/ Category:Public transport in Paris Category:Organizations based in Paris
title: RATP Group
